name: Bingo Ice Cream Maker
description:
Do you love to eat ice cream then you should know how to make your own dish.

Hello Friends we are here with our new cooking game.

As we have seen in past cooking games have been trending. there are many games like kitchen , soup and hamburger cooking games in market.

so we planned to make a game to prepare your own ice cream. Our princess had gone to a store where you can make ice-cream in front of you by choosing all the ingredients like chocolate , bowl or corn. topping and much more.

This ice-cream maker games is simulation of making your favorite flavor ice cream at home on your smart phone .

Need to feel cream in your mouth use your skills and get awesome feeling this summer.

How to play:
- select different flavor you like
- start preparing in pen by adding added flavor , cream and basic ingredients.
- Add eggs and milk.
- Select type of bowl or corn.
- select cookies for decoration.
- select topping
- decorate the ice cream and add scope you like.
- Ready too serve your ice cream.

Hope you will enjoy the games, we have tried to bring mouth watering experience to you smart phone.
Soon we are launching smoothies maker.

Please leave valuable feedback your opinion is important for us to improve.

Enjoy!!
